selected_skills.name: calc_numeric
selected_skills.purpose: To compute numeric expressions needed to find the sum of angles in the triangle.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to calculate the sum of the other two angles in the triangle using the triangle angle sum property.

selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: To format the final answer in the required format.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to return the final answer as an option label or exact value as per the instruction.

new_skill_specs.name: angle_bisector_property
new_skill_specs.purpose: To apply the properties of angle bisectors to determine the measure of angle ∠BOC.
edge_cases: Ensure that the sum of angles A, B, and C is 180°.
